title: [Question]10th grade marks card
content: i need my 10th grade marks card for some work. How do i get it from pes???

comments.body:
![gif](giphy|l8vN5etR8DIoHA0qzV)

Or you could just go to the accounts/admission office and request it.
Write a letter to your hod and Get constent and seal on that, and submit it in the Admin Block.
Go to MRD block and ask
Will they give it the same day or will they make you run around for it? Also is there any thing else like a letter required with a signature or should I just go and ask them directly?
And also will it be open on Saturday?
No idea, we were asked to collect it, didnâ€™t go and ask them for issuance
Maybe yes, maybe no.. considering admissions are still going on.. maybe
